      • formatNanoseconds

        public String formatNanoseconds(long nanos)
        Description copied from interface: DurationUtil
        This method formats the given nanoseconds as a human readable String.
        nanos formatNanoseconds(nanos)
        1 "0.000000001"
        61000000000 "1:01"
        7141123456789" "1:59:01.123456789"
        1234567890123456" "14D06:47:07.890123456"
        Specified by:
        formatNanoseconds in interface DurationUtil
        Parameters:
        nanos - is a duration in nanoseconds.
        Returns:
        a human readable duration.

      • formatMilliseconds

        public String formatMilliseconds(long millis)
        Description copied from interface: DurationUtil
        This method formats the given milliseconds as a human readable String.
        millis formatMilliseconds(millis)
        1 "0.001"
        61000 "1:01"
        7141123" "1:59:01.123"
        1234567890" "14D06:47:07.890"
        Specified by:
        formatMilliseconds in interface DurationUtil
        Parameters:
        millis - is a duration in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        a human readable duration.

      • formatSeconds

        public String formatSeconds(long seconds)
        Description copied from interface: DurationUtil
        This method formats the given seconds as a human readable String.
        seconds formatSeconds(seconds)
        1 "1"
        61 "1:01"
        7141" "1:59:01"
        1234567" "14D06:56:07"
        Specified by:
        formatSeconds in interface DurationUtil
        Parameters:
        seconds - is a duration in seconds.
        Returns:
        a human readable duration.

      • formatDuration

        private String formatDuration(long duration,
                              long unitPerSeconds)
        Parameters:
        duration - is the duration to format.
        unitPerSeconds - is the number of units per second (duration/unitsPerSecond is the duration in seconds).
        Returns:
        the formatted duration.

      • appendSegment

        private void appendSegment(StringBuilder buffer,
                           long segment,
                           boolean seconds)
        Parameters:
        buffer - is the StringBuilder to append to.
        segment - is the segment to append (hours, minutes, or seconds).
        seconds - - true if segment are seconds, false otherwise.
